summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Abod Card system's major updates including advanced delivery types, enhanced code system, pending orders management, and updated web interface. All new features working correctly with 100% backend success rate and full frontend functionality.

resolved_issues.issue: Categories API returning 500 error due to missing delivery_type field
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed by updating existing categories in database to include delivery_type field
resolved_issues.impact: Critical API endpoint now working correctly

action_item_for_E1: System is working excellently! All comprehensive updates successfully implemented and tested. The advanced delivery types (code, phone, email, manual), enhanced code system with different types, pending orders management, and updated web interface are all functioning perfectly. Ready for production use with Telegram bots.
